```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```

Read in the nodes and select the coordinates at random.
Then convert the coorinates to epsg:26912 (meters)

## Data and conversion

```{r}
# nodes
nodes <- read_csv("R/data/nodes.csv")
# n is the number of wavs
n <- 100

mySample <- nodes %>% sample_n(n)

```


## Generate new file

```{r}
ids <- read_csv("test/input_new/small_mix/ridehailfleet_wav.csv") %>% 
  transmute(id, rideHailManagerId, vehicleType=NA, initialLocationX=NA, initialLocationY=NA, shifts=NA, geofenceX=NA, geofenceY=NA, geofenceRadius=NA)

tibble(
  id = 1:n,
  rideHailManagerId = "GlobalRHM",
  vehicleType = "WAV"
)

```
